titleStmt.title: A true description out of the VVorde of God of the visible church
titleStmt.author: Barrow, Henry, 1550?-1593.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Barrow by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.)
Imprint date on t.p. altered to 1599.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
